name: TV Rain
description:
TV Rain (Russian: Дождь, tr. Dozhd, stylized as ДО///ДЬ) is an independent Russian television channel. Launched in 2010. It focuses on news, discussions, culture, politics, business reports, and documentaries, with most shows broadcast live.
In March 2022, Russian authorities blocked access to TV Rain in response to its coverage of the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine. TV Rain continued to broadcast via YouTube.
